Detailed Description

Bottleneck assignment problem (BAP) implemenation.

Implemenation of the bottleneck assignment problem (BAP) that's used as a lower bound for the Bottleneck TSP objective value.

Author:
John LaRusic

Definition in file bap.c.

Function Documentation

int arrow_bap_has_assignment ( arrow_problem *  problem,
int  min_cost,
int  max_cost,
int *  result 
)

Determines if the problem has an assignment using only costs min_cost <= c_ij <= max_cost.

Parameters:
problem [in] problem data
min_cost [in] minimum cost to consider in problem
max_cost [in] maximum cost to consider in problem
result [out] ARROW_TRUE if an assignment is possible.
